descriptionHtml:
[i][b][color=#ff0000][size=6][u]NEW VERSION [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92157]HERE[/url]! THIS MODPAGE NO LONGER SUPORTED[/u][/size][/color]
[/b][/i]

Trying to make her in Skyrim with pre-existing mods and tools... here's what I got. 

[size=3]
[font=Tahoma][b]Well, I've packed all the stuff that I've edited myself and that I think are crucial in a zip. However at the end of the day, you HAVE to have the required mods to have her exactly how she looks like in my game.

[/b][/font]
[/size][u][size=5]Requirements[/size][/u]

[list]
[*]ECEE - RANs Enhanced Character Edit Enhancer by [b]RAN46[/b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35713/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35713/?[/url]
[/list][list]
[*]Enhanced Character Edit - More Body Sliders by [b]Septfox[/b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57440/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57440/?[/url] [size=5](VERY IMPORTANT: DOWNLOAD UPDATE [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/ajax/downloadfile?id=1000229160]XPMSE 3.91 Skeleton[/url][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/contents/images/icons/magnifier.png[/img] from their page! Also make sure during installation you check the non-counter scaling, ECE-EXTENDED config option, 4x range 8x granularity options in the installer!)[/size]
[/list][list]
[*]Katarina's Gear by [b]kapy1049[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72840/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72840/?[/url]
[/list][list]
[*]Demoniac- High Quality Glossy Female Body Texture 8K 4K 2K by [b]Regenbot03[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?[/url]
[/list][list]
[*]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by [b]Blessed Redux Project team[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?[/url]
[*]Better Makeup for SKSE by [b]Diethardt: [/b][u]High Res EEO Tintmasks-Warpaints fitted for Mature skin by maevan2[/u][size=3] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?][size=1]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?[/size][/url]
[/list][list]
[*][b]KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies and Stealthic[/b][b] [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?[/url]
[/list]
[size=5][u]Recommended[/u][/size]

[list]
[*]Arise - Chapter 1 - The Black Sacrament by [b]AmethystDeceiver (for the bracers and gaiters)[/b] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5696/?[/url]
[/list][list]
[*]Snapdragon Prime ENB by [b]tetrodoxin[/b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?[/url]
[/list][list]
[*]Leah Lilith Jewelry 1.2 for the collar/choker/necklace (google it)
[/list][list]
[*]SlaveTats (google it)
[*]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by [b]SydneyB [/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?[/url]
[/list]



[u][b][font=Tahoma][size=6]Installation[/size][size=1](how to make your player look like her)[/size]
[/font][/b]
[/u][size=3]Aight here is the "tricky" part for the less experienced modders, the installation X_X. So I'm gonna try to make it as intuitive as possible. [/size]
[size=3]First things first, this is NOT a "1.install requirements 2.install mod" type of thing it's more like a "1.install requirements 2.select the desired files from the mod package 3.replace them in the correct folders" type of thing. [/size]

[size=3]The most important file is the one called: _6_commonTriRaces.slot which is where I believe the data for all the face, tints, hair eyes and body -how they should be-', stored. SO with that in mind follow the steps below


[/size]

[list=1]
[*][size=3]INSTALL ALL THE REQUIREMENTS CORRECTLY[/size]
[*][size=3]OPEN THE ZIP THAT YOU DOWNLOADED FROM HERE BY ME[/size]
[*][size=3]OPEN C:\Users\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\CME_save (where ever that folder is for you)[/size]
[*][size=3]PASTE "_6_commonTriRaces.slot" INTO IT[/size]
[*][size=3]IF IT ALREADY EXISTS NAME IT "_x_commonTriRaces.slot" WITH X BY ANY NUMBER THAT IS NOT USED ALREADY[/size]
[*][size=3]OPEN E:\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Meshes\KS Hairdo's[/size]
[*][size=3]BACKUP THESE 4 FILES:  "Gecko.nif, GeckoHl.nif, Lilio.nif, LilioHl.nif"[/size]
[*][size=3]PASTE :Gecko.nif, GeckoHl.nif, Lilio.nif, LilioHl.nif" from KatarinaDCloosefiles.zip\files\meshes\KS Hairdo's INTO IT[/size]
[/list][size=3]


[/size]
Now, if you have ECE, the same texture, body, face tints and hair mods then you can go ahead and launch the game. Type "showracemenu" into the console and then select the correct body load in ECE racemenu (its the slot Nr.x)
Oh, and don't forget to make yourself into a female first DUH.




[size=5][u]Tattoo[/u][/size]

[size=2]I don't use racemenu to apply the tattoo, I use the mod called "SlaveTats" to apply it. The mod is very modular and it's also easy to use. What I did was simply replacing any tatto with "Katarina body tattoo.dds" that I made (its in the zip) by renaming Katarina body tattoo.dds to whatever the pre-existing tattoo was. Then applying it in-game afterwards. Of course MCM is required.[/size]

[u][size=5]EXTRA

[/size][/u]Note that I also included the gimp file of the tattoo with the paths intacts for you to edit yourself should the tattoo look distorted. 
A copy of all the armor meshes that I used in the screenshots are also included because they are edited by me. So they are different than the ones provided by their respective original mods. You may wanna replace them with those edited by me.



__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[u][size=6]P[/size][size=1]ost [/size][size=6]S[/size][size=1]criptum

[/size][/u]PLEASE FEEL FREE to MAKE HER INTO A FOLLOWER WHAT NOT <3 I'M TOO NOOB TO KNOW HOW TO DO THAT.
Anyways, ask me questions, I'll gladly answer.
author: Chokolocco
